text: Sano jwaakun’jongolaga Allah, basi jwalakwe ni jwakongoka, nambo ŵaakwalechelela kusokonechela, basi mmwe ngam’ba mwapatiile akukamuchisya ni gosa jwangaŵaga Jwalakwe, ni tuchasonganganya Lisiku lya Kiyama chamakuku ali ŵangalola, ŵangaŵecheta soni ŵangapikana, mauto gao ni ku Jahannama. Ndema jilijose jaukaliteje (Motowo panandi), tukaujonjechesyeje kukwao soni kulapuka
